name: Choice Surveillance
tagline: I don't take your security lightly!
body:
### Welcome to Choice Surveillance
Thank you for visiting my site. Please feel free to contact me concerning your needs. Listing below does not represent all that can be done for you but are some examples of what has been done.  
-Home Automation  
-Access Control  
-Alarm Installation (Licensed by the state of Texas)  
-Alarm Maintenance  
-Lighting Control  
-Audio/Video Installation and Maintenance  
-Computer Networking  
-Custom Networking  
-Server Maintenance and Repair  
-Pre-wire of a home or business to suit your needs  
-Camera Installation and Maintenance  
-Microphone installations


### Experience
My latest gig was working as a contractor for the state of Texas installing cameras and maintaining small four camera sites and also large thousand plus camera sites with custom monitoring solutions. High security is my specialty. I have attended various training seminars by top video monitoring companies. I am certified to work with Video Insight software. I am also licensed by the state of Texas for installing alarm equipment. I am also RTI certified for those wanting an affordable whole home remote solution. I have been working in my related field for over 10 years. Building my knowledge and work ethic. I take pride in my work. Rest easy knowing I'll treat your home or business like mine.

### Service Areas
I serve the greater Houston area, Pearland, Missouri City, Stafford, Sugarland and surrounding areas.

### Support or Contact
Please feel free to email me at lee@choicesurveillance.com for any questions. Thanks and have a nice day!
